body.name: Full-Sized 2.4GHz Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo with Comfortable Palm Rest for Windows, Mac OS PC/Desktops/Laptops（Black）

features: ▶[Comfortable Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo] : This wireless keyboard mouse combo has a comfortable touch and typing feel, this wireless keyboard design with palm rest and folding holder that can protect your wrists from injury even when typing for a long time. Note: The USB receiver is in the battery compartment of the keyboard, you can find it when open the keyboard battery cover.

▶[2. 4G Stable Wireless Connection] : This wireless keyboard and mouse combo share the same USB receiver, no need to take upadditional USB ports (Also the wireless keyboard and mouse can also be used separately). Plug & play, no need to download any software, 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays.

▶[Auto-enter Power Saving Function] : This wireless keyboard mouse combo need not any switch, It has a smart power saving chip, when you stop using the keyboard more than 10 seconds, stop using the mouse more than 2 minutes, they will auto-enter sleep mode respectively to save power. This feature greatly extends the battery life, you can click any button to activity the device.

▶[3 Adjustable DPI Wireless Mouse] : This is a optical wireless mouse with 3 levels adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600), you can get your favorite mouse movement speed by adjusting the DPI button. Optical wireless mouse also can smooth movement even on smooth surfaces. In addition, this wireless mouse is symmetry design, no matter you are Right handed Left handed, both hands are available, suitable for all people.

▶[Universal Compatibility and 12 Months After-sales Service] : Our wireless keyboard and mice combo compatible with windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/X, Mac and other operating system. Works well with desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. Our promises that our product have a 12-month free after-sales service. Even after the Amazon return period, as long as you contact our email, we will help you solve all problems.
body.description: Smart Power Saving Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it This wireless keyboard and mouse combo with smart power saving function, No need ON/OFF switch. The wireless keyboard will auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it more than 10 seconds, the wireless mouse will auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it more than 2 minutes, never worry about wasting battery by forgetting to turn off the switch. Press any key or button can make the wireless keyboard mouse re-activity when they in power saving mode. Comfortable Palm Rest 3 Wireless Keyboard Indicator Lights 2 In1 USB Receiver 3 Levels Adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Widely Compatibility Our wireless keyboard and mouse combo compatible with Windows/Mac OS/Linux system. But please note the Copy/Paste shortcut buttons in Windows and Mac OS system are different: Copy/Paste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Mac System： Win + C/V Copy/Paste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Windows and others System： Ctrl + C/V Smart Power Saving Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it This wireless keyboard and mouse combo with smart power saving function, No need ON/OFF switch. The wireless keyboard will auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it more than 10 seconds, the wireless mouse will auto-enter power saving mode when you stop use it more than 2 minutes, never worry about wasting battery by forgetting to turn off the switch. Press any key or button can make the wireless keyboard mouse re-activity when they in power saving mode. Comfortable Palm Rest 3 Wireless Keyboard Indicator Lights 2 In1 USB Receiver 3 Levels Adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600)

13 Multimedia Shortcuts This wireless keyboard with 13 multimedia shortcuts, can provide you with the best entertainment experience. Comfortable Palm Rest This wireless keyboard with comfortable palm rest, protect your wrists from injury even when typing for a long time. 3 Indicator Lights This wireless keyboard with 3 Indicator Lights: Number Lock IndicatorCaps Lock IndicatorPower Indicator

2 in 1 USB Receiver Both wireless keyboard and wireless mouse share the same USB receiver, No need to occupy additional USB ports. Where is the USB receiver? The USB Receiver is in keyboard battery compartment, you can find it when you open the battery compartment cover. 3 levels DPI(800/1200/1600) This wireless mouse has 3 levels DPI, you can adjust the mouse movement speed by pressing the DPI button, make sure you can find your favorite movement speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend this wireless keyboard/mouse combo!
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is lightweight overall and I would consider the mouse to be medium-sized with options to customize the two buttons on the side. The keyboard has adjustable feet if you want to tilt it. The keys have a soft feel and are relatively quiet. It's also a classic size (not compact) so if you are more of an old-school typist you will love it. And the separate number keypad is ideal.Set up was super easy!! Plugged the dongle in and everything worked. Both are very responsive, especially the mouse.Battery life is LONG! I have had mine for almost a year, working 10-hour days and I haven't changed the batteries yet!Overall, it's an affordable and reliable combo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars built in wrist support
reviews.reviewText: I like the light weight, the accuracy of typing, well spaced keyboard and it is pretty. Mouse has to be centered click to restart after a rest.. which I hope will extend its battery life.wireless and easy to get it installed.nice product at a good price.oh and customer service on this is just great. housekeeper tossed the connector to computer, sent new keyboard with exchange, just to get that part..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seller stands behind their product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this keyboard about 7 months ago. It worked well earlier and then I started having error when I tried to log on. I realized that the keys on the keyboard are no longer responding correctly. Sometimes I have to type so hard just to get it to register the letters. This was not supposed to hard to type on. So, the keyboard is not a good bargain. I had to quickly buy a Logitech replacement.Update: The seller reached out to me and expressed their willingness to replace the item as it is covered under warranty. As I mentioned, I have enjoyed the keyboard until it gave me problem. Seller explained their 12months warranty on their product and their willingness to exchange the product or issue a refund. Since I had hastily purchased another keyboard, I could not request for a replacement (my error), so I opted for a refund. I think this seller is worth giving a try. They explained their plan to review reason for the defect and to take necessary steps to correct it. I am changing my overall rating from 2 stars to 4 stars, because I did not give the seller the opportunity to remedy a defective product before submitting my review. I did not know the warranty on the product was still valid. So, you should feel safe to buy this product because the seller stands behind the integrity of their product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with this keyboard. The mouse works well too. It was very easy to connect to my mini Mac .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three of these in the past several years. They work great and do help with wrist placement. They are heavy duty and do not move around while you’re typing. I write for a living and I rub the A, S, W, E off as well as the period, but that’s on me! It’s a great keyboard and I will continue to use it as long as I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mouse eats batteries
reviews.reviewText: I like the convenience of wireless, but not when there is a shirt battery life.1. The mouse does not shut down if left idle. I turn it off when I leave the room to save battery life.2. The 1.5v alkaline battery life is about 3 hours. I learned from research, the following cause short battery life: 1. Recharsble batteries are not strong enough for a wireless mouse. 2. Having the mouse too close to other wireless devices - the keyboard is wireless and does not operate until activated by the mouse. I need my cell phone near my desk to receive second authentications as necessary and it is my primary phone. 3. Mouse in the same area as router. This is my den. Of course, the router is in the den. 4. Using the mouse on a dark surface. My desk is brown. I'm trying different white surfaces, but the mouse drags. I'm considering returning this wireless duo, and adding 2 more cords back in my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard for an old-fashioned typist.
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with my new keyboard. My senior eyes can see the keys I had trouble using on my new device. I’m a typist and the flat keyboard was extremely hard to navigate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use for work as I wanted to get rid of wires on my desk. I’ve had it for about 4 months now and while it started out great, the keys have lost their “soft touch” and are no longer silent typing; additionally the mouse lags no matter how much I try to correct it. The keyboard is also starting to lag more and more causing typos, missed letters, duplicated letters, etc. I would buy it again, but I would not recommend it for daily use in an office setting. I am already looking at replacing it. Would be good for home use, homework, occasional browsing/typing/etc.
